Package hdf.view.ImageView

Interface ImageView

All Superinterfaces:
DataView
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface ImageView extends DataView
The image view interface for displaying image object
Version:
2.4 9/6/2007
Author:
Peter X. Cao
